mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memIdx, memId, memPwd, memName, memAge, memGender, memEmail, memProfile) VALUES((select IFNULL(MAX(memIdx)+1,1) from Member mem), #{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{memName}, #{memAge}, #{memGender}, #{memEmail}, #{memProfile});
mapper.select: select * from Member where memId=#{memId} and memPwd=#{memPwd}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET memPwd=#{memPwd}, memName=#{memName}, memAge=#{memAge}, memGender=#{memGender}, memEmail=#{memEmail} WHERE memId=#{memId}
mapper.select: select * From Member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN MemberAuth auth on mem.memId=auth.memId WHERE mem.memId=#{memId};
mapper.update: update Member set memProfile=#{memProfile} where memId=#{memId}
